__e: A world of darkness is all of our problems.
I saw you ... walk in darkness ... and I know you do not feel so bad there.
But I have learnt many things in the darkness, and one of them is this - I cannot do this alone.
But it ain't all Dark, and it ain't all Light. And it ain't all ours.
She told me you were going Dark anyway. I would never hurt you.
But according to this, Dad, maybe darkness isn't just dark. But like... But like a thing.
